name: Hole (Daddysucc5000)
description:
My submission for Ludum dare 48

Go down a hole and shoot everything that moves

The game is playable on both controller and keyboard

Known bugs:

  • The shotgun doesn't have a sprite
  •  The shotgun uses 9mm ammo because I was too lazy to make my own 3d model
  • The enemies sometimes go through walls
  • The player sometimes goes through the red walls without dying
